overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Welcome to the Meia Capital internal portal â€“ a centralized hub to view and analyze our clients, portfolios, and key financial metrics! Visualize your data with ease and stay informed with the latest, real-time insights.

totalRevenue.title: Total Revenue (CAD)
totalRevenue.description: Total revenue generated by Meia Capital from all clients' fees.

totalAUM.title: Total AUM (CAD)
totalAUM.description: Total assets under management (AUM) across all client portfolios.

averageFeeRate.title: Average Fee Rate
averageFeeRate.description: Average fee rate across all client portfolios.

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: View dedicated client data with ease. Our clients are the heart of our business, and we're here to support them every step of the way. Explore their unique data and insights to better understand their needs and goals.

fileUpload.title: No billing data found
fileUpload.description: Looks like you haven't imported any data yet! Upload a single Excel file (.xlsx) containing all data, or four CSV files (.csv) for clients, portfolios, assets, and billing tiers.
